title: 'Watch strap'
body: Watch strap is of worst quality that it gets damaged by ant bits, didn't except this from quality brand !!

title: 'Battery is coming only for 3 to 4 days maximun'
body: 'I purchased recently from MI store and charged using provided USB cable from laptop but battery is coming only for 3 days or maximum 4 days. I am not using any extra activities and no settings are changed.. battery perspective I can rate it only 2 out of 5'

title: 'Received damaged and opened packaging'
body: 'The media could not be loaded.'

title: 'budget friendly watch'
body: 'Redmi Watch 3 Active is stylish which has a good mix of features and performance. It has a large and bright display a comfortable design and a long battery life.  I liked the bluetooth calling feature the audio is loud and clear. I go swimming with the watch on and also its build quality is top notch. The battery life is also good and it lasts for more than a week. The fitness tracking features are accurate and the 100+ sports modes are more than enough. The watch is also responsive and easy to use.  Overall I loved the experience with the smartwatch and its functionality and would easily recommend to anyone looking to purchase this'

title: 'Awesome Bluetooth calling'
body: 'Bluetooth calling is better than most smartwaches in the segment. Its so easy to use that I use this while driving also. Design looks posh. Battery is pretty good.'

title: 'Great product from Xiaomi'
body: 'I have been using Watch 2 lite since 2 years & was looking for an upgrade and Watch 3 active Looks great gives a premium feel as compared to other budget smartwatches. Perfect for my day to day needs bluetooth calling is a plus'

title: 'Superb Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch'
body: The interface is incredibly intuitive, making it a breeze to use. The watch faces are really cool, and the design is just sooo elegant. It's versatile enough to fit any look, whether I'm dressing professionally or heading out for a casual occasion. It has lots of workout mode, especially for few of sports that are not mainstream like winter sports!.. Loved it for this!! This smartwatch has truly exceeded my expectations! 5 stars!

title: 'Functions are good'
body: 'Very good product you must buy it Wonderful üòä excellent watch for girls its comfortable while wearing it üëçüèªüëçüèªbuy it üòä'

title: 'Gooog'

title: 'Value for money!'
body: 'Looks great gives a premium feel as compared to other budget smartwatches. Perfect for my day to day needs bluetooth calling is a plus'

title: 'Cool looks and awesome performance. Absolutely Loving it all. Great work by MI'
body: 'Pros: 1. Design 2. Display quality and UI 3. App connectivity 4. Great Watch faces Great work by MI and the whole marketing team'

title: 'Very poor battery life
rating: if you keep display ON always.'
body: '1.0 out of 5 stars''Very poor battery life if you keep display ON always.'

title: 'Good Watch'
body: 'Really happy with the purchase. Love the looks and the display - very premium.  Edit - Update after more than 10 days of use  Very good battery life. Charged to 100% before using and it is still going on after 10 days. Limited BT calling but health tracking is always on. Step and Sleep tracking also seems accurate - sleep tracking has been very useful.'

title: 'Amazing watch for the price'
body: 'I was using a firebolt watch till now which costed me 4999 I would say this watch is much better than my previous watch  Screen is much brighter Calling quality is superior Battery life is surprisingly good Great build quality - feels very premium  The only ask I have from Xiaomi is that they launch multiple color options for this or straps maybe it would be amazing'

title: 'Apple Watch killer'
body: 'Best watch till date‚Äô amazing quality just wow Premium quality strap amazing features. Good speaker alert etc go for it ..'

title: 'Perfect Product for gifting'
body: 'Have brought this watch for my mother. She loved it. The watch is quite seemless and easy to operate. Looks premium as well.'

title: 'Poor heart rate reading'
body: 'When running heart rate not measured properly. DND once started does not go off at end time. Cannot use workout feature when not carrying phone. Steps reading is proper hope mi fixes the issues in future updates.'

title: 'Elegant design with great UI and app experience'
body: 'Pros: 1. Design 2. Display quality and UI 3. App connectivity 4. Great Watch faces  At initial usage accuracy looks pretty good but will monitor it for longer use and update my review accordingly.'

title: 'Very good product'
body: I'm in love with the bright display and sleek design of this smartwatch. Even after multiple calls in a single day, the battery remains impressively intact

title: 'Great design at affordable value. Expensive but worth it.'

title: 'Stylish and functional smartwatch'
body: I recently purchased this product, and I must say, I loved the desig and also the features on offer. The sleek and stylish appearance immediately caught my eye, making it a perfect addition to my collection of gadgets. It has a premium look that's hard to find in other products in this price range, What truly sets it apart is its battery life. I can go hours without worrying about running out of battery, even during heavy usage with sports modes everyday. This feature alone has made my life so much easier and I don't need to carry the charger everyday everywhere

title: 'Best smartwatch in sub-10k segment'
body: This smartwatch offers multiple, highly accurate fitness tracking modes that cater to all my needs. Its call option is unmatched in its price range. Plus, it's the first watch I've seen with such a stunning design and premium metallic finish

title: 'Best smart watch!'
body: '"Pros: 1.) Premium look and feel 2.) Easy to pair with phone 3.) Smooth BT calling experience 4.) Big and brighter display 5.) Smooth touch and flawless UI "  Cons- None till now'

title: 'Awesome Smart Watch with BT calling'
body: 'Feels very comfortable on hand. Amazing design and great touch experience. Very smooth phone connectivity'

title: 'UI & the watch design'
body: 'I absolutely love the app experience; it enhances the overall enjoyment of using this smartwatch  The design is just too good'

title: 'Premium look'
body: 'This is a premium smartwatch experience on a budget. Perormance is smooth and app experience is better. Sensors are much more accurate as compared to my previous watch. Wish redmi comes out with more such reliable quality watches in near future'

title: 'Looks great'
body: 'Watch has a premium finish and looks great. Pairs smoothly with phone and has a good UI. Go for it'

title: 'Very good watch at this price'
body: 'Looks very premium. Accidentally brushed the wall while wearing it on day 1 itself but no scratches! The display quality is much better than others and exceeded my expectations.  Health tracking seems accurate so far - really easy to monitor on the watch and the app is very good as well. Was really looking for 5ATM water proofing which is not available at this price.'

title: 'Feel premium with such affordable price'
body: -It has a premium look at such affordable price. -Very easy to pair and it is very user friendly. -Touch experience is awesome. It has a comprehensive health tracking features. -Highlighting feature is it's Bluetooth calling and big display. -Strap is soft and comfortable. -My wife and I loved it üòç
